space.serialization

Interface WorldSaver

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ModelToJson

    public interface WorldSaver
    This interface specifies how the server will save the world.
    Author:
    James Greenwood-Thessman (300289004)

    • Method Detail

      • saveWorld

        void saveWorld(java.lang.String savePath,
             World world,
             java.util.List<Player> players)
        Saves the world.
        Parameters:
        savePath - the path of the save file(s)
        world - the world to save
        players - any additional players that need to be saved but don't exist in the world
